name: Curious Mav: The Level
description:
Curious Mav: The Level

This is a regular hardcore platformer level. There are no conspiracies, nothing mysterious or cruel. I promise! *

Controls

Best played with a controller

Left Stick / WD         -> Move Left Right

A Button / Space       -> Jump, confirm

X Button / SHIFT       -> run

* This promise has no legal effect. I assume no liability for compliance with this

More from Curious Mav
